channel.title: cCANT LOG ON INTO MY OWN SREVER?
channel.description:
k well im running the server on my computer and i run the client and everything works fine. well my friend came over and we were gunna play so i went on my sisters computer and i use the ip changer but when i type in the ip it doesnt connect? i dont know why im not able to connect cuz im using right ip and the server is on with other people on it
HELP is it cuz were using the same router?

item.title: cCANT LOG ON INTO MY OWN SREVER?
item.dc:creator: @ModAssassin ModAssassin
item.description:
@ModAssassin wrote:

[quote=“mithpkz, post:1, topic:285668”]k well im running the server on my computer and i run the client and everything works fine. well my friend came over and we were gunna play so i went on my sisters computer and i use the ip changer but when i type in the ip it doesnt connect? i dont know why im not able to connect cuz im using right ip and the server is on with other people on it

HELP is it cuz were using the same router?[/quote]

it may be because of the router, try umm…connectiong you’re server to a new port instead of 43594…change it to like 55394 or sumpgin/

Read full topic
